description: This file defines the RecipeRepository class, which provides access to recipe data, including fetching all recipes, searching recipes by title, and getting a recipe by ID. It uses mock data within the class for offline demo purposes.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: Provides access to recipe data, backed by a static list of recipes, with methods to fetch all recipes, search by title, and retrieve by ID.

methods.name: getAllRecipes
methods.description: Fetches all recipes, simulating a network delay.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches recipes by a query string matching the title, ignoring case.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its unique identifier.
